title: How does Santa Claus look? - Quora

response.answer_text: Even though he isnt real, he is very fat, he has a white beard, and wears red cloths with a black belt. Also, you can look it up, but that is what I know off the top of my head. Since you are on the topic about christmas, merry christmas and stay safe!
These are all Santa actors. They are all real.
